channel.title: Global Game Jam on csMACnz's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Global Game Jam on csMACnz's Blog

item.title: Global Game Jam 2009
item.description: This weekend I was lucky enough to participate in Global Game Jam 2009 in the Dunedin, New Zealand Team.For those of you who don’t know what Game Jam is, it’s a 48-hour game building competition run in multiple centers around the world simultaneously.Dunedin entered three teams and successfully made 3 games in the 48 hours allocated, with a total of 10 people participating in Dunedin, and a total of over 1700 participants worldwide.
